Submitter Information: Trinity Biotech (Primus Corporation, dba Trinity Biotech)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Premier Resolution System high performance liquid chromatographic analyzer
Methodologies: Separation and quantitation of hemoglobin species
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Trinity Biotech Premier Resolution System for automated ion-exchange HPLC analysis of normal and variant hemoglobins in venous whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Automated HPLC system for quantitative analysis of normal hemoglobins (A, A2, F) and qualitative detection of major variants (S, C, D-Los Angeles, E) in venous whole blood from all ages; for professional laboratory use only
